trans-unit.source: After seconds seconds have passed, content previously cached will be discarded and re-rendered. Code associated with that route will not be executed; rather, its previous output will be sent to the client with a 200 OK status code.
trans-unit.target: 经过 seconds 秒钟后，先前缓存的内容将被丢弃并重新呈现。与该路由关联的代码将不会执行；相反，其先前的输出将以200 OK状态代码发送到客户端。
